welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Steenbergen, Netherlands! Known for its picturesque canals and historical buildings, we invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and charm our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Woensdrecht Airport.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a small fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first hour and then at a charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
